overview: Detective Takeo Kosai (Koichi Sato) is about to be demoted. He then plans to entrap Akira Dojima (Jun Kaname) without his partner Detective Emi Ishikawa's (Chiaki Kuriyama) knowledge. Akira Dojima kidnapped and killed a girl 15 years ago
tagline: Drama is based on the novel "Kaibutsu" written by Kazuyo Fukuda (published June 3, 2011 by Shueisha Inc.).
title: Kaibutsu
